description.displayText:
Natalia P. worked for me as a babysitter since October 2011 to May 2012. She took care of my 1 year old boy, and her responsibilities included: cooking him healthy food, doing his laundry and light housekeeping. As a caregiver she was loving, responsible, punctual, and very patient.

Our boy was always happy and in a great mood!

 She engaged him in different development games, constantly talked/sang to him, took him for walks in the park and overall helped him explore and learn new things each day. We were happy with her service, but my in-laws moved in and no longer needed help. 

I recommend Natalia to work as a babysitter and I am sure she will do a great job.

Our boy was always happy and in a great mood!

 She engaged him in different development games, constantly talked/sang to him, took him for walks in the park and overall helped him explore and learn new things each day. We were happy with her service, but my in-laws moved in and no longer needed help. 

I recommend Natalia to work as a babysitter and I am sure she will do a great job.

description.displayText: Natalia was recommended by a close friend and she has become my first choice. She's very reliable, energetic, organized, loving and FUN! My son adores her and I should add I have a very hyper toddler but she knows how to keep him engaged and active. She has prepared a few meals for us and they were very healthy and as my son would say "yummy!" I definitely recommend her.
